Text.Page:
We believe that the new soldiers here are merceneries, so money is their primary objective.

To be so organized, though, they can't be working independently. More importantly, we think we've identified their leader. Find {@LinkCreature:16#1007#Captain Kirithia} and bring me her head. That should throw a wrench in their wheel.

Marvelous!

Good job. I'm sure we'll see the fruits of this soon.

What, you thought I was being figurative?

No, I literally want the woman's head!

Now go, quickly, and get it!
